values:
Wow. So its been forever since I have updated. Sorry about that. Now where should I begin. 

So my job has been going really great. The people there are amazing. They make me laugh all the time. At first I felt like they didn't like me, but then after getting to know them a little more and them being comfortable around me things got better. I crack jokes all the time at work. I always play off what others are saying. But yeah it going good. For a while I felt like the boss hated me, but then I overheard her saying how i was a good worker and good at my job. Since then I have gotten more hours then anybody else. The lord has blessed me with a great gift. So lately none of us have been getting hours. I needed at least 40 hours and I was only getting about 20. So I decided to get another job. The job i found, or should I say stumbled into was CHEF, at the hotel I work at already. How awesome is that. I'm gonna learn how to cook. But don't tell Annie, I love when she cooks for me, and how I pretend not to know how. 

Lets talk about LT. Its seems like It been forever since I've been here. 5 weeks I believe. CRAZY.  I'm so busy all the time. After I work like 4o+ hours I do LT for another 23 probably. It seems like Im always on the go. But Im learning alot so its worth it. 

NOW ON TO THE MAIN EVENT

ANNIE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I love this girl so much. She makes me so happy. Every time I talk to her no matter how I'm feeling, she always seems to lift my spirits. The other day Steve told me that he can really see how much were in love. Not me and Steve but me and Annie. He also said that like the mournings I do talk to her are the days I'm most happiest. He says I have a better outlook on life. I AGREE. I wanna grow old with this girl. I want her to be apart of the rest of my life, and for me to be a part of the rest of her life. She doesn't know it but I'm saving up for something really special for her. SHHHH don't tell. Gosh I cant wait till she comes and visits. I want to hold her so bad. and kiss her and squeeze her cheeks... ok not that last one, even though I would if she would let me. I love her.


I think I'll end with that. 

I LOVE ANN ETHEL NELSON SO MUCH.

LITTLE BOY DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO

EVERY TIME THOSE GUYS ARE THERE

HE KNOWS WHAT THEY BOUT TO DO 

THEY BOUT TO MAKE HIM SCREAM THERE NAME

AND BEAT HIM TILL HE'S BLUE

CANT ANYONE HEAR HIS CRYS

THERE ALL INSIDE

BATTETED, TORN, BRUISED IN THE BASEMENT

WHY DONT NOONE KNOW

THE THINGS THEY DO WHEN MOMMA AINT HOME

CANT THEY LEAVE THIS POUR BOY ALONE

HES DONE ENOUGH

HE NOTHING NOW

HE GAVE IT ALL

ALL HE HAD

THEY TOOK IT

HE AINT NEVER GETTING BACK

HE'S INICENCES, HIS PRIDE

THEY ALL DEAD

NOW NONE RESIDE

HE STILL DREAMS ABOUT IT

EVEN THOUGH HE GROWN MAN

EVERY NIGHT HE IN PAIN

CAUSE THEY

MAKE HIM SCREAM THERE NAME

HE CAN SEE THERE FACES

THERE LAUGHTER

THERE EYES

HE CAN SEE THERE PLEASURE

AND HIS HATRID STARTS TO RISE

BUT WHAT CAN THIS BOY DO

STRAP TO THE FLOOR

WHEN A BIG GIANT SOMEONE

COMES KNOCKING DOWN HIS DOOR

These things keep fallen from my eyes

I try stopping them

but they dont  listen to me

I tryed my hardest

not to fall asleep

I failed again

now I must weep

these dreams wont stop

I wish they would

but then I wouldnt be 

drownding in 

these things that keep fallen from my eyes

They are so fast

they will not cease

I can not breath

please, please

go away

All I see 

Is a picture show

a picture show of life

a picture show 

of my deepest

my darkest 

fears. 

fears of drownding in these things that keep falling

from my eyes.

People say that when I write poems, I sound crazy, or that they normally dont understand what I am saying. Thats probly true, because to understand me, you would have to know my past. You would have to know why I do the things I do. You would have see the internal me. You wouldnt understand unless you knew me. You wana know me, ask. Ask why I stay up at night, ask what I think about, ask me if I'm ok inside. Ask me? I so badly want tell people, I wana tell people about the secrets that  hold me, but I'm so afriad, that even if I get the chance, I couldnt do it. But if you were to ask me. If were to ask me, Whats your life been like, Or whats happended in your life thus far. I could tell you. Then I would ask you. 

I have no clue on what is ahead. if to fall or fly or if I'll be dead, I do know I love her, and whats more than that, a soulmate forever not just a draw from a hat. a chance of a life time, a moment to sweet, is a moment with you, the day that we meet, at a chaple in june, under the stars, the quiet steps of your feet, the world soon to be ours, as your eyes meet mine, and we say our I do's, that is the day, I will finall have you, have you forever and a day, but only if you want to, What do you say?

So tonight was so much fun. Megan came over and watched LG with me. It the third week in a row, so we decieded we would watch all the episodes toghther and whoever else wants to also. Then we watched My Sweet 16, those kids are so spoiled. Anyway going to bed now, talk to you lator

Just sitting at megan's house updating. She is on a date right now with Harry Potter or maybe Ron Weasly, No Megan says its definitly RON, so jelous, I could beat him up anyday, hes lucky I just dont get into that book and strangle him, but anyway my birthday is coming up so quickly, its the 7th of August, it should be so much fun. On the 6th I am having my birthday party, ohh yea. Well small group tonight, should be fun. BYE

Everyday trials

I was once lost in darkness,
A wandering nomadic fool,
Teetering on the edge of reason,
About to plunge into the abyss,
Then a light shone down,
Lifted me out of darkness,
Touched my soul with grace,
And beat love into my heart,
That was when I met you,
My loving girlfriend,
For so long now you
Have continued to save me,
Day after day,
You gave me the reason to be,
To live and to feel love,
To go on and find my dreams,
As long as you were there,
I just wanted to let you know,
That I could never fully express
How much I feel for you,
When I love you 
Seems so simple,
How can you put into words
The power of desire I have for you,
Pray to God,
Channel the muse,
And let my fingers type the words,
My heart beats because of you,
My soul is bright and alive,
Because of you,
And even when the trails of today, or yesterday
Seem to distract me,
My love is always devoted to you,
It is eternal within my heart,
Like a constant thunder in my soul.

I can not let a wedge come between us, I feel heart broken. I have wanted to just curl up into a ball and cry since yesterday. I feel all alone in making the right decion. there is only one thing I can do now, and that is to pray. I haved stayed up all night praying and have been praying since then none stop. I dont like to feel alone. I love you, Forever no matter what.

Well today I am starting to move in, I basically have my whole room over to the new house. I am moving boxess all tommorrow so that should be fun. Anyways, today was so fun, stayed the night at my aunts house, and hung out with all my coool cousins, my cousins boyfriend came over and played me in a game of basketball, it was fun. Then we watched Dodgeball because my cousin alicia hadnt seen it yet, then I went to bed
The next day I got up went to the golf couse and played 18 holes for free, because my cousin works there, I golfed with my cousins boss's grandson, he is 14 so it was fun, at one of the holes I went to drive and the club sliped right out of my hands and the club flew 30 yards so that was funny
after that I went back to there house ate, then went home, where I started moving my room. 
Then we all went out to dinner at applebees, where I saw Shaun Spevak I know I spelled the name wrong so sorry Shaun. 
Then my family went to Meijer to pick out bed sheets and stuff for my new bed they bought me today, so that was fun, we went back put them on then left. 
I am so excited for moving, cant wait till I am in and I can have friends over, we can have party and things its going to rock
Well anyways time for bed so I gotta go.

MEGAN, this is my comment to you incase you dont get it.: 
Today, was so awesome. I moved all my boxes over and my dad bought me a new bed. Its a full size with an exstention. Its huge we went out and bought brand new sheet and comferter. I am soo excited, It has room for two, so I will have lots of room (hint hint, nudge nudge). I wish I would of got your entry earlyer cause I was trying to call your cell all day. Alwell I will probly get you tommorrow or somthing, and you will totally have to come over and play vidoe games or board game of whatever even eat dinner. I love you and I miss you. And who is this grandpa you speak of, do I know him, lol, just kidding, Tell your grandma I love her and miss her grandma care, you know what I mean, and tell your aunt she is the coollest ever, and that I love her too, and tell the beutiful girl with them with the brown/black hair and blue eyes, and very preaty smile (if you dont know yet I am talking about you) that I love her sooooooooooooooooooooooo much. I will talk to you tommorrow. I am just moving a bunch of boxes over to the house all day.

Hey everyone, Guess what I am moving, I am so excited. Tommorrow is when we close on the house and get the keys and right after that we start moving stuff over, I am sooooo excited. Well Megan left for texas today so I miss her alot, but I know she will have tons of fun, Last year I went on a trip with her and it was a blast, I wish I could of gone this year,alll welll. Still anyway if anyone of you wants to help me move my crap into the other house just leave a commment of call me if you know the number. I would like the help, I'm not sure if I need it yet but it would be fun to hang out and do a little moving now wouldnt it. I love you Megan Van Every, have a wonderfull trip your soo awesome. I will miss you.

Today was fun, but hard work. The whole family is packing for our big move. We are finnally moving up in the world, we are finnally going to look rich, but we still wont be, we will only look like it, no just kidding, but anyways Ya megan came over and helped me pack some stuff up in my room, she had to leave though to go do some chores at her house then go to work. Now my room is full of nothing, its all in boxes, by this time wednesday I will be sleeping in my new house. We get the keys Wednesday and sign all the papers so YIIPPPEEEEE. WEll after hours of packing I went down to the pool to swim, met up with my friend dale then swam around alittle. Talk to a cousin of an old friend which was cool. I was supposse to call this old friend like 2 months ago but I lost the number for the secound time and I promised I would call the next day but didnt cause I lost the number, but anyways havnt called her since I saw her like I said I would cause I didnt wana make her mad or anything, there probly wouldnt be anythign to say anytways besides whats up and how have things been, stuff like that. But now I am just watching tv and letting the night slip away. Hopfully I get to eat soon I am hungry. anyways that was my day, here is a quick poem I wrote in like 10th grade:
 Apoclaypse
Red
Death
Like
Quiet smoke
Betrays the
Night
And in
Return
In gulps
The day
Atrocious
Beast 
Come out
And take
The world
At large
All good
Is strung
Up
And Comsumed
Waist pours
Throughout
And the world
Runs

Have you ever felt like a shooting star. Like for just a moment in time you shine and then your gone. Your at the top of it all and all others stars have stoped just to see you go by, then your already gone and there back to doing what they've always done. Everyday there is that moment where your the shooting star, atleast one moment everyday, your the center of it all. It might be amoung twenty or just one, but theres allways that moment. Thoses are the moments you have to live for. They come they go, they are gone in secounds, dont let em slip

When you love someone so much that you would die for them, and so much that if you made them upset you would just wana tear your heart out cause you know that making them upset makes you even more upset, and when you get to the point where you said something stupid and you cant take it back, it hurts so much that you cry your self to sleep that night. When you love someone to the point where if you had to get beaten up over and over or jump off a cliff or lift the heaviest thing on earth, you would always find a way to do it and a reason to do it, and of course the reason would be them. You love someone to the point where if they left, you would die inside, everything around you would seem to fade away. All that you loved doing, you would realize that you only loved doing that because that certain someone was with you. you realize that without them life would be unbearable. You realize that you would fight anyone and anything just to get them back. Even yourself, which is the hardest battle to win, the battle agianst yourself. When you find the person you know you wana spend the rest of your life with, everything feels right, and when you are away from them, you want them near, you want them to be there with you, to love you, to hold you. I belive the only real way to know you truely love someone is when there gone and you want them more than anything. They say that it is better to love and lose them then to never have loved at all, but the reason you know you loved them is because there gone and you want them back. When there gone, your so confused but at the same time deep in your heart everything is all clear, and you realize you love them and it hurts even more cause there gone. She was gone, now she's back. I won the battle within myself. I lost her, and it hurt and I ran from the hurt, and hide from it, and found other thing to hide my hurt, so that it seemed all ok,but inside I was a mess but now thats she back it realy sucks cause by hiding from my hurt, to her it looked like I never loved her at all. I hurt her by running from my hurt, and if I loved her enough I would endure any hurt no matter the size, now I will always screw up and probly allways make her mad, but I still love her. and always will. There isnt a girl in the whole world like Megan Lee Van Every

Hey, take me away
dont let me drift
I have no paddles
I want to swim
the waters cold
can anyone hear me out there
calling to anyone
my motor broke
my gas is leaking
theres a wierd guy in the
back smoking a cigar
he might blow up the boat
so you better come quick
if you dont 
I'm lighter fluid 
bout to be light up
there's a tree growing
in the center of my boat
letting all the water come in
I guess I'll climb it since my boat
is begining to sink
the airs nice up here
even through there a mama bird
pecking at my head
I wounder what she wants
so I look up
She wants to teach me how fly
so I try
and try
and try
and finally as the tree goes under
I lift off and there I go
Flying high into the sky
So high I break the ozone layer
thiers oxygen escaping 
so what do I do
I pull out one of those clown balloons
the ones used to make a dog and mous ect..
and I gave a huff and a puff and blew that balloon way big
then I stick it right in the hole, but before that I have to get outside
into space 
to push it in
and what do you know
I'm stuck out there
well lucky for me
an alien space ship comes and picks me
and takes me back to their home planet
were I get my self a new boat and head home to sail agian
well I get back and I'm sailing real good when all the sudden
a star falls from the sky right onto my boat
so what do I do well I throw it back
I dont want no burning ball of gas on my boat
well its been a long day, so I ought to head home
but ohh guess what I have no paddles
I want to swim
the waters too cold
can anyone hear out there
calling to anyone
my motor broke
and the gas is leaking 
and theres a strange man in the back
smoking a cigar
............................................................................................................

I dont know where
I dont know how
I dont know why
I dont know what
I dont know when
all I know
is that everyday
I'm thinking of you
every time that I have nothing else to do
your still on my mind
When am playing football
or swimming at the pool
or in the church
or at the school
your on my mind
and I dont mind
I like thinking about you
all the time
I love you 
ohh so much
cant you see
I would do anything 
to have you hear with me
I would swim every ocean
and climb every tree
and I would go anywhere
to see the show
that you put on 
in my mind
thats always in your eyes
which I gaze upon
and slowly, slowly melt away

Sunday: The day I go to church, then I come home. Usually I am a very good christian with only little family fudes. Depending on how I am that day or not I usally worship with heart. 
Monday: Well now I will be going to wieght training from 8:00-11:30. Then after that I will probly have to clean the house or do other chores around the place, probly arugue with my brother over somthing supid who knows.
Tuesday: Sleep in, dont have anything to do. Clean the house agian, fight with brother or his friends agian. 
Wednesday: Get up at 7:00 get ready for weight training, then go to weight training, then come home, clean, fight with brother. 
Thursday: Sleep in, Wake up, Clean
Friday: Go to court, come home, WHO KNOWS AFTER THAT
Saterday: WHO KNOWS
SUNDAY: GO TO CHURCH AGIAN

Thats my life this week, how fun, there is probly going to be time where I go to a friends house or megans house or outside or somthing like that, my schudule is preaty much open to anything.

I realized that all the experiences I have had so far in life, both good and bad, each have had there conceqences, and both have cause some kind of pain inside of me, even if it was a little or a lot, there was always some kind of pain, because there was always some kind of change. I have always walked through life afraid of who I was going to hurt and that has caused great pain inside of me. I dont know I am just rambling I will finsh this thought lator

You're like me! The intelligent loner. You're shy
at times but friendly, and you are never weak
and always independent. You are incredibly
intelligent (wise beyond your years) and have a
talent for many things (sports, music, art).
You have a kind and warm personality and enjoy
the simple things. Like hanging out with
friends and watching movies at home. But you're
sometimes quiet nature makes you a bit of an
outcast and a mystery to people. No matter how
pretty you are or smart or athletic, you just
can't seem to break into the crowd and be
noticed. Don't worry, try to be more outgoing
and speak out when you have more to say. Don't
hide behind your books and sports and computer,
get out there and get noticed. You also have
deep desires in life and feel vunerable and
alone at times. Don't feel sad either, What
helps me to express feelings and dreams that I
can't say to people, is through my writting.
Maybe you should try. 

Got this off of Beckys xanga so sorry becky for stealing it, but I thought this was alot like me, besides the music and art and preatyness.

He has a feeling he cant put his finger on. Maybe its because he is scared, or maybe its because he is acually confused. But will he let this feeling control him, or will he control this feeling. But while controlling this feeling is he missing out on life secrets, these secrets only he can expericnce though letting go and holding on. Maybe this feeling is untrue, unreal, but at the same time what if were true ,what if it were real. Is his inability to just sit back and watch going to destroy him. Is his confussion on the matters of the heart, a burden he will live with untill he dies, or does he love agian. His fear of failure consumes him, not letting him bring to life the feelings he has. Making his feelings dorment, abashed,  unapproachable. He can see all the amazing, astonishing, awe-inspiring, awesome, exciting, hair-raising, heart-stirring, impressive, magnificent, moving, overwhelming, spine-tingling, stunning, thrilling things that could come of letting his feeling run him. But he also sees all the anxiety, apprehension, cold feet, consternation, dismay, distress, dread, fear, fright, horror, nervousness, panic, scare, strain, stress, tension, terror, trepidation, unease, uneasiness that is tied to it....................................I'm scared to fail, but will my fear hold me, I am not sure of this yet. I am holding back on somthing I want so much to have. I want to apaixonado, to be Dans l'amour, to be No amor, and it will be kariktan.

I'm lost. I have no clue what to do. No one can understands what I am going through, because no one is me, and only I know exactly how I am feeling, Here I will try and write it out for you: Lets say you spend all your time and energy on this one thing, this one thing that all the sudden vanishes in front of your eyes, and there is nothing you can do about it, but its some of your fault that it vanished, and some not your fault, well what do you do. Its like you are forced to make life altering decisions that you dont know how to make. The only thing you have is feelings, so you go on those, but those feeling only will lead down the wrong path, and knowing this you still go, because its the only thing guiding you. These feelings that you think are right but are not, because you have made stupid decisions before only on emotions. Its like you strap your self in for the ride and then see how it pans out. And these decisions that I have made about this certain thing, I have no clue if its the right decisions. When you devote yourself to one thing for a long long time, you cant just drop it, It doesnt seem right to just drop it, and you think to yourself, I could never just drop it, but then when you do, your confused, because all you ever thought, never came true, you lied to yourself the whole time, basing all you had on your emotions, and your emotions traped you. They made you believe something that wasnt true. Maybe at the time it was true to you, but then as time went on you realized it was never really true, you realize that it was all a trick, a lie, somthing you made up in your head to feel secure about yourself, to make yourself feel wanted, loved. You came up with these false feelings because you thought at the time it was all true, but now when everything is over, you realize that nothign was true, at the time maybee it was  but not now, I mean how could it be true now. You told your self that this one thing would be in your life forever, and you would do anything to keep it that way, well what if you realize thats it partly your fault you lost it. You didnt just lose it, it was your fault, after making a promise to never let go, you cut the string, you left the place, all on this one emtion that turned out to be false. So your just left so sit and think to yourself, "all my decions based on my feeling were wrong, and never worked out, it only led me to more and more hurt." There were good and there were bad times, but it never worked out. Now there will always be a place in my heart for that one thing, but can I realy be to sure about that, I mean ever other promise I've made, I've broke, So I guess all I can do, is get on the ride and wait till it all pans out. I gotta have faith that the decision I am making is the right one, hopfully for my sake it is, but lifes kinda like that, you have no control over anything but at the same time you have all the control.  See I have a little advantage now, I got God. I have faith that my future decions will work out. Thats all I got, so I'm holding on to that. NOW problably this makes no sense, because probably I am just rambling, but it comes from my heart, it might not make sense to you, and thats ok, you would have to be me, to fully understand.

Block City 
by Robert Louis Stevenson 
What are you able to build with your blocks?
Castles and palaces, temples and docks.
Rain may keep raining, and others go roam,
But I can be happy and building at home.

And see on the steps of my palace, the kings
Coming and going with presents and things!

I am at a point in my life where everything is changing, and I like it but at the same time I am scared. I have been through my share of friendships and relationships to know its hard. Everything I once new, all my relationships, all my friendships have changed, and especally my relationship with god. My life so far, has been way off track. I have put on a face of smiles but inside I was a wreck, I was never really happy. Even the people closes to me they made me happy but when I got home I was miserable all over agian. But things have changed, god came and made it all better. He healed me. He gave me these christian friends that are cool to hang out with. Now I have my times where I am all depressed but most the time I feel happy. God gave me christian friends and a christian youth group were we can all go and be toghter and worship and learn and grow. I went to this youth group before but it wasnt the same. It was differnt. No one knew who I was inside and some still dont. Some still dont know the pain I feel. This pain that I am dealing with, and others feel the same pain,and with them I can share and then be there to listen. God has worked in my life and changed It all around. I'm not going to waste anymore time not doing what god had planed for my life. I am ready to do it. And now I accually have people my age wanting to do it to, and be there to be accontible. So when I say that everything is changing thats what I mean. Becky, Sweet, those two I feel are like there with me. They understand and they are on fire, just as I am, and we get along, and I can start a  revolution with them and know that they have my back and I theirs. SO THANKS YOU TWO. You both are really making a difference in my life. You are more than friends to me. You are spirtual buddies, ones I can call on for help, or for strength. The only thing that matters is giving fully to god, and doing his will, and when you do that, you will live a much better fufilling life you cant even dream of. So lets grow togther. Here is a peom about how you SWEET and you BECKY impact my life:
BACK ME UP

my life was incomplete
I'd never really let god work
and let him guide his sheep
He took me by the hand and lead
and said now travis follow me
but me being my stupid self
said no god let me lead

into this aweful place
I told myself who needed him

but then when I steped out on my own
it was made clear to me 
that when you turn your back on god
there are many really aweful things
things that can hurt you

things meant only for hurt 
and distorting all your true dreams
but then god placed you in my life
to lead me back to him
so thank you for being there
and being such a good christian friend
you lead me out of that place 
a place I shouldnt of been
now were growing strong in the lord
lets let it never end

I just got done taking a nap. It was fun because for about three hours I wasnt grounded but I was in a world of dreams. My dream went Like this:  I was standing In a field of lawn gnomes and they were real, they were upset because I wasnt paying them enough to stand in my yard, my yard was about three hundred acres, it seem as if it went on for years. Anyway their he was the head gnome, which out of all the gnomes was the tallest standing at about 3 feet tall. He was demanding that I give them a raise. He was telling me that if I didnt he and the others would attack me. So I stood there and took his badgering and when he was done, I told him straight off "NO" so he whistled and called the rest of the lawn gnomes over, they were all dressed in war outfits and had knifes, So I ran. When I got far enough away I stopped and called Amanda Sweet and asked her if she could help she said "Give me 10 minutes and I will have a full army of Leprechauns right there to fight." this was good because Leprechauns hate gnomes so in ten minutes they were there and we had a full fledged war on our hands. It was brutal but in the end the Leprechauns won. Then they left. Out of what was left of the gnomes I took and used in my yard in the back. Now in the back yard there is a huge pool and Girl gnomes so they were happy even getting paid 2 dollars and 50 cents a day. 
Cool dream huh, yeah I was ungrounded and watching a war between two close relatives, it was great. Anyway Now I am awake and am very bored. Leave a COMMENT about what you think of my dream. anyway got to go to nothing here is a quick poem
Roses are red 
Vilotes are blue
I love leprocons
How about you

Also I love GOD so it great. anyway here is a poem about how much We need each other and why we should go to church:

WE NEED EACH OTHER



I once was like a coal
All lonely and dark
When Jesus came and touched me
With His Holy Ghost spark

Then I became an ember
Glowing with His fire
And serving the Master
Was my only desire

But as time went on
The assembly I neglected
And my spiritual life
Became seriously infected

As an ember burns out
If its not with the others
Our spiritual life will also die
Without our sisters and brothers

For we must come together
As Gods family
And worship Him as one
In spiritual harmony

So forget the little differences
And forgive one another
For then the world will see Jesus
In the love we show each other

And as the day approaches
Of Jesus returning
We need each other more
To keep the fire burning

So Christians every one
Lets walk hand in hand
Then with God we will conquer
This great and awesome land.

By: Peter Enns

NO forgot a poem well here is a quick one:

                                     

A Day at BOB'S

By Travis Walter

In life one thing leads to another
which leads me to tell you this particular tale I suppose .
One fine morning Bob said to me,
It's that time of the year again,
I think you could prune the rose.
Right then says I and off I went to get the clippers from the shed .
The next thing I started to prune.
The neighbour passed by and said ,
Good morning. Hard at it then
Yes I said , I'll be finished soon.
I was snip-snipping away when the window opened .
It's that time of the year,
you could move the rose.
Right then says I so I dug up the rose and placed it into a new bed
then gave it a light hose .
The window opened again .
I didn't really want it there.
Could you plant it up the other end. Right then says I ,
but the other end was in such a mess
it was a job I just had to attend .
I pulled out weeds, dug up roots ,
then I thought while I'm at it I may as well extend the rockery .
So there was I with rocks around me
and a rose pruning job that turned out to be a mockery.
